text: Santino Verbeek is a Dutch kickboxer fighting for the ONE Championship organization. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2019 World Fighting League −86kg Champion * 2018 World Fighting League −86kg Champion ==Professional kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
